description:
Open Invention Network as the practical solution for open source community against patent aggression

Open source projects and companies become more and more the target of patent trolls which want to score easy money from those having it in excess or just those small vulnerable to such blackmailing. 
more at:
http://www.t-dose.org/2013/talks/open-invention-network-practical-solution-open-source-community-against-patent-aggression
title: Open Invention Network, against patent aggression
